title: Was Pete Buttigieg’s Father a Marxist Who Spoke Fondly of ‘Communist Manifesto’?
subtitle: As the 2020 Democratic presidential primaries began to heat up, so did the scrutiny on candidates and their connections.
author: Dan MacGuill
vclaim: Joseph Buttigieg was a "Marxist professor" who "lauded" and "spoke fondly" of "The Communist Manifesto" written by Friedrich Engels and Karl Marx.
